title: AU Small Finance Bank explores corporate tie-ups to engage more FPOs
description: AU Small Finance Bank plans to raise stake in the farm sector by lending to FPOs. It aims to work with corporates like Adani Group, ITC, and Reliance. The bank has supported 500 FPOs and aims to grow this number tenfold in the next three years.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
